result.title: Staff Engineer
result.description:
Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field with 5+ years of professional software development experience.
Proficient in programming languages: Go or Python.
Experience using RDBMS and/or NoSQL technologies.
Experience and knowledge of REST API development. 
Hands-on experience in designing micro-services & SOA based applications. 
Solid knowledge in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Design Patterns.
Agile-scrum methodology experience in a software development team.
Good understanding of version control workflow such as Git.
Excellent communication, organization, and presentation skills.

Additional Qualifications

Hands-on experience with Async architecture (e.g., Celery or Redis Queue).
Hands-on experience with public clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP.
Hands-on experience with K8S, docker and a good understanding of virtualization technologies.
Familiarity with Networking is a plus.
